H0.text: On which town or city's beach did John Stonehouse do his Reggie Perrin (disappearing act). Honolulu

H1.text: On which town or city's beach did John Stonehouse do his Reggie Perrin (disappearing act). Barcelona

H2.text: On which town or city's beach did John Stonehouse do his Reggie Perrin (disappearing act). Sydney

H3.text: On which town or city's beach did John Stonehouse do his Reggie Perrin (disappearing act). MIAMI

A4.text: Stonehouse left a pile of clothes on a beach in Miami to make it appear that he had suffered a fatal misadventure while swimming.
